Title: Ralph Lauren redefines shopping with Microsoft AI–powered styling companion Ask Ralph
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Consumers are using AI more to shop and search for products, and they want it to be personal, frictionless, inspirational, and accessible. Ralph Lauren worked with Microsoft to develop Ask Ralph, an AI-powered conversational styling companion that provides outfits for any occasion, styling tips, and gift inspiration from the Polo Ralph Lauren brand. Ask Ralph puts Ralph Lauren’s unique and iconic take on style into its customers’ hands.

Read the full customer story at https://msft.it/6059s9t55
